name: taxonomy
description: The taxonomies from which taxonomy terms are taken.

id.name: id
id.title: Identifier
id.description: The identifier of the taxonomy. Each entry must have a unique identifier

name.name: name
name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the taxonomy from which terms are sourced.

description.name: description
description.title: Description
description.description: A free text description of the taxonomy.

metadata.name: metadata
metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: A record of the changes that have been made to the data in order to maintain provenance information.
